body_html:
The change in #788 (use robustcheckout) helped, but didn't entirely get rid of this problem. Here is an example of a build which, despite robustcheckout retrying, ran into enough problems that it still failed.

I think the next step here is to look into using a non-AUFS filesystem for the destination of the mercurial repo, like @indygreg suggested.

@indygreg thanks for the recommendations. I think that the change to our CI model you proposed would be a good thin in the long term. I've been watching this kind of work closely, and when it is ready I'd be happy to try it out.
